title: New: R – Change
content:
Everything about R is rather perfect.

The idyllic blue background of his white, single line logo, and a track simply titled ‘Change’, which just so happens to come in at precisely three minutes, fits seamlessly with his bold, atmospheric sound. Change is slick, expertly produced and one of the finest introductions to any artist I’ve heard this year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
